title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Article 18 of Regulation (EC)
heading: 2. The European Union (Occupation of Road Transport Operator)
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Occupation of Road Transport Operator) 
Regulations 2018 (S.I No. 265 of 2018) are amended by the insertion of the 
following Regulation after Regulation 3: 

“3A. 
The Minister is the national contact point for the purposes of 
Article 18 of the EU Regulation and Article 14(1) of Section 1 of Part A 
of the Annex.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 February, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 
Minister for Transport. 

1 OJ No. L300, 14.11.2009, p. 51 
2 OJ No. L149, 30.4.2021, p. 10 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 14th February, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [28] 3

title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Article 18 of Regulation (EC)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Statutory Instrument gives full effect to Article 18 of Regulation (EC) No 
1071/2009 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 21 October 2009, 
as well as Article 14(1) of Section 1 of Part A of Annex 31 to the EU-UK Trade 
and Cooperation Agreement. This Statutory Instrument designates a national 
contact point for the purposes of the Regulation and Agreement. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [28]
